name: ABC
text: WATCH LIVE: Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden faces questions from voters in the key swing state of Pennsylvania in an @ABC2020 Town Hall moderated by George Stephanopoulos. https://t.co/zQk75oXaB1

name: ABC
text: Pennsylvania voter asks former VP Biden what his administration would do to deal with COVID-19 that hasn't been done by the current administration: "There should be a national standard...it is the presidential responsibility to lead." https://t.co/JEyTOkSHhS #BidenTownHall https://t.co/LVadRjb4lg

name: ABC
text:
Undecided PA voter asks former VP Biden if a vaccine was approved before the end of the year, would he take it?
He says if it's gone through testing and it's backed by scientists then "Yes. I'd take it and encourage people to take it." https://t.co/JEyTOkB6qk #BidenTownHall https://t.co/iuQnyYO5Jk

name: ABC
text:
RT @ABCPolitics: “The scientists will disagree with the economists … How can you contain the pandemic without crushing the economy?” @GStephanopoulos presses Biden.

“You can contain the pandemic by being rational,” Biden says, referencing his plan to open businesses. https://t.co/vdomLZXGTS https://t.co/qzPpBiM1dU

name: ABC
text:
“I’d go to every mayor, I’d go to every councilman, I’d go to every local official and say, ‘mandate the mask,’” Joe Biden tells @GStephanopoulos when pressed on how a national mask mandate could be enforced.

“The words of a president matter,” he adds. https://t.co/JEyTOkB6qk https://t.co/biF9RUlQth

name: ABC
text: “The words of a president matter; When the president doesn’t wear a mask and makes fun of folks like me when I’m wearing a mask for a long time, people say it must not be that important,” Joe Biden says. https://t.co/ax5X76HFgb

name: ABC
text: .@GStephanopoulos presses former VP Biden on if it's wise to raise the corporate tax when the economy is weak: "We're going to invest a great deal of that money into infrastructure and green infrastructure." https://t.co/JEyTOkB6qk #BidenTownHall https://t.co/LiBphg1qz0

name: ABC
text:
RT @GMA: Q: "What's your view on the crime bill that you wrote in 1994, which showed prejudice against minorities?"

Biden: "Things have changed drastically..."

https://t.co/omGodzYfv1
#BidenTownHall https://t.co/7YdzUtlQ5G

name: ABC
text: WATCH LIVE: Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden faces questions about the Supreme Court in an @ABC2020 Town Hall moderated by George Stephanopoulos. https://t.co/1blRq4yOFW

name: ABC
text: .@GStephanopoulos presses Biden on the 1994 crime bill and if he still believes 'more cops mean less crime': "Yes, if in fact they're involved in community policing and not jump squads."  https://t.co/JEyTOkB6qk #BidenTownHall https://t.co/OW6MGiw51D

name: ABC
text: Pressed repeatedly by @GStephanopoulos on his position on court packing,  Joe Biden says, “I’m not a fan … it depends on how this turns out,” adding that it depends on how Republicans handle the confirmation of Supreme Court nominee Amy Coney Barrett. https://t.co/JEyTOkB6qk https://t.co/rpcrzh5aRO

name: ABC
text: Asked about fracking, former VP Biden says: "First of all, I want to make it clear, I do not propose banning fracking...it has to be managed very, very well...the future rests in renewable energy." https://t.co/JEyTOkB6qk #BidenTownHall https://t.co/vAfZGnXiqb

name: ABC
text:
.@GStephanopoulos on court packing: “Don’t voters have a right to know where you stand?”

Biden: Voters will know "before they vote."

GS: “So you’ll come out with a clear position before Election Day?”

Biden: “Yes, depending on how [GOP] handle this.” https://t.co/JEyTOkB6qk https://t.co/RHnfjixsHU

name: ABC
text: Former VP Biden at #BidenTownHall: "We shouldn't be defunding cops. We should be mandating the things that we should be doing within police departments and make sure there's total transparency." https://t.co/JEyTOkB6qk https://t.co/wQxPPRdKRi

name: ABC
text: Asked by a mother of a transgender child about what he will do to protect LGBTQ rights, former VP Biden says: "I will flat out just change the law." https://t.co/JEyTOkB6qk #BidenTownHall https://t.co/fxg7AhKwHG

name: ABC
text:
“How can you contain the pandemic without crushing the economy?” @GStephanopoulos presses Joe Biden.

“You can contain the pandemic by being rational,” Biden says, referencing his plan to safely open businesses and schools. https://t.co/JEyTOkB6qk #BidenTownHall https://t.co/jxicptdvOD

name: ABC
text: Asked by @GStephanopoulos about the next debate, former VP Biden says he does expect to be there. https://t.co/JEyTOkB6qk #BidenTownHall https://t.co/x9d4MroD4m

name: ABC
text:
.@GStephanopoulos: “If you lose, what will that say to you about where America is today?”

“It could say that I’m a lousy candidate,” Joe Biden says, but adds he hopes it "doesn’t say" U.S. is as divided “as it appears the president wants us to be.” https://t.co/JEyTOkB6qk https://t.co/n4MCkIYcVU

name: ABC
text: Fact-checking ABC News' #BidenTownHall: https://t.co/cbg19QPd6a

name: ABC
text: .@jonkarl: “Donald Trump was asked a very simple question by a voter — what is your plan to deal with health care and rising health care costs? And it was abundantly clear that he has absolutely no plan.” https://t.co/EIatJV8hoS https://t.co/Yt1JZRolk0

name: ABC
text:
RT @ABCNewsLive: .@marykbruce: "I was struck...how much Joe Biden tonight really talked about his plans." https://t.co/Njmq6moaLJ #BidenTownHall

"He didn't really speak that much about Donald Trump." https://t.co/IFBPnyvZvu

name: ABC
text: .@byronpitts on Joe Biden: “It isn’t enough for many voters that he is not Donald Trump.” https://t.co/JEyTOkB6qk #BidenTownHall https://t.co/LPI5SplmNk

name: ABC
text: The impact of the social distancing can be seen in sales figures — the National Restaurant Association reported that 70% of restaurants suffered a drop in revenue during August from a year earlier. https://t.co/A3prgs1Xz8

name: ABC
text: Asked by a mother of a transgender child about what he will do to protect LGBTQ rights, Joe Biden says: "I will flat-out just change the law." https://t.co/AHhqjfwTJc #BidenTownHall https://t.co/mc4KkDnsmr

name: ABC
text: Meteorologists are expecting warmer and drier weather this winter for much of the U.S., the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration announced in its 2020 winter outlook. https://t.co/PTLbvVFOr2

name: ABC
text: FULL OF FALL: Stunning drone footage shows rich autumnal foliage covering the Vermont countryside. https://t.co/Pl8WysEcbW https://t.co/ZzRYFOMEpv

name: ABC
text:
.@GStephanopoulos: “If you lose, what will that say to you about where America is today?”

“It could say that I’m a lousy candidate,” says Joe Biden, adding that he hopes it "doesn’t say" the U.S. is as divided “as it appears the president wants us to be.” https://t.co/JEyTOkB6qk https://t.co/rhhh3I8hAm

name: ABC
text: Social media helps mom spot rare cancer in her baby's eye. https://t.co/GtUJiZYnDA

name: ABC
text: A self-described neo-Nazi has pleaded guilty to federal hate crime and explosives charges for plotting to blow up an historic synagogue in Colorado. https://t.co/oT93BSi505

name: ABC
text: Man accused in the fatal fall of his young granddaughter from an 11-story cruise ship window pleads guilty to negligent homicide. https://t.co/NcldDHGTJ3

name: ABC
text: ROO ON THE RUN: Commuters caught off guard, but they don't look too surprised, as a kangaroo hops through a light rail station in Australia's capital city. https://t.co/YPkVSb2CLg https://t.co/R6tqX31uwX
